name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WisePlay  For PC,Windows and Mac(Easy Use)

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically plays YouTube Video when a YouTube link is inputted  also You Can  Uplaod from your Local Computer For Play.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our "WisePlay for PC, Windows, and Mac" a versatile extension offering seamless video playback. Enter YouTube links or upload local videos effortlessly. Enjoy the convenience of playing both YouTube and uploaded videos with just a click. Upgrade your viewing experience today!

✅ WisePlay Extension Features

✔️1) Enter Youtube Video link For Play.

✔️Upload any Video From Your Local Computer For Play.

✔️Play: Easily Play Here Youtube video And Uploaded any video.

✔️Easy To use

✔️Simple Extension


✅ How To Use WisePlay on PC?

Step 1: Start by adding this extension to your Chrome browser by clicking "Add to Chrome."

Step 2: Next, click on the Extension icon.

Step 3: You will see Here:

"Youtube Video link"

"Upload any Video From Your Local Computer For Play"

Step 4: In the first tab, you can add Youtube Video link, In the second tab, you canUpload any Video From Your Local Computer For Play. Enjoy the convenience of playing both YouTube and uploaded videos with just a click. Upgrade your viewing experience today!

✅ Disclaimer:

Please note that "WisePlay for PC, Windows, and Mac" Chrome Extension is an independent product and is not associated, affiliated, or endorsed by the WisePlay Android app or its developers. We respect intellectual property rights and make no claim to any copyrights associated with the WisePlay Android app.
